results.title: Joining in (TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Pre School Child”.
Development from simple to more complicated forms of social play is gradual, and this film identifies six different stages. Also points out different ways in which adults may encourage and take part in children’s play.

results.title: Staying number one: The Swingers
results.creator_credit: Ray Argall, John Cruthers and Musical Films
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Pop Movie”.
Follows the quest for fame and fortune by the New Zealand rock group, “The Swingers”, in Australia starting with their hit ‘Counting the Beat’ and tracing them through their involvement with the feature film ‘Starstruck’, to their eventual break-up in mid 1982. Includes interviews with promoter Michael Gudinski, the group’s manager, and “The Swingers” themselves as well as several promotion clips.

group_works.title: Manufacture of sheet lead and lead pipes

results.title: Bossing
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Plumbing”.
Instructional film demonstrating the skill of bossing - flowing or drifting of lead from one part of sheet to another by blows from hardwood instrument.

results.title: Copper flashings and weatherings
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Plumbing”.
Making a copper slate, laying out the job on a drawing board, cutting out, flanging and welding the two parts, annealing. Soakers, chimney apron, step flashings, gutter. Protection of corners, internal and external.

results.title: Solder
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Plumbing”.
Making a roof cesspool by another method, use of solder. Consideration of materials used. The solder itself, wiping cloths, plumbers’ black. Preparing the work for soldering; method of soldering; tools used.
results.description:

results.title: Soldered spigot joint
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Plumbing”.
Tapering the end of the pipe with special tool, opening out with mandrel, use of coning tool for shaping, insertion of brass liner and application of solder. Recapitulation in diagram form.

results.title: Bending lead pipes
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Plumbing”.
The process of bending a lead pipe subjects it to certain stresses and strains. Shows the procedure to correct the difference in pipe wall thickness that occurs.

group_siblings.title: Manufacture of sheet lead and lead pipes

results.title: Copper sheet roofing
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Plumbing”.
Softening of copper sheet by annealing; principle and method of joining sheets together by welting; single and double welts. Application to actual roofing: use of seaming pliers; making the upstand at wall end; fixing of sheets to roofboards with tacks or cleats; standing seams. Treatment at roof edge: cover piece and flashing at upstand end; another type of upstand to fit a corner in which there is an arris; use of pleating tool; the batten roll, joint, upstand and roll end.
